modName: Better Starting Stuff - New Items in Helgen Keep
summary: New items in Helgen Keep for starting characters.
descriptionHtml:
I wanted to add some new gear for my Frost Mage/Archer character in Helgen Keep, and now decided release the Mod. It changes the two almost empty chests to have Mage equipment and Heavy Armor (respectively). It also adds an Iron Greatsword and Iron Gauntlets to the Heavy Armor chest, even though the screenshots don't show them (also the Leather Bracers have been removed - they were a misclick). Also, it adds a Staff of Flames, Steel Dagger, and the Spell Tomes:

Bound Sword
Frostbite
Healing Hands
Fury
Ironflesh
Magelight
and Raise Zombie (even though the screenshot doesn't show some of them)

Hope you enjoy the mod! :)

Dovahkitten

<br />
<br />CREDITS
<br />
<br />Bethesda for the Creation Kit and Skyrim.
author: Dovahkitten
